sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_GOODS SET GOODS_NM = #GOODS_NM# , GOODS_NM_SUB = #GOODS_NM_SUB# , GOODS_INTRCN = #GOODS_INTRCN:CLOB# , GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL = #GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL# , WAIT_TIME = #WAIT_HH#||#WAIT_MI# , MVMN_TIME = #MVMN_HH#||#MVMN_MI# , DELETE_AT = 'N' , ACT_LA = #ACT_LA# , ACT_LO = #ACT_LO# , FILE_CODE = #FILE_CODE# , VOCHR_TICKET_TY = #VOCHR_TICKET_TY# , VOCHR_NTSS_REQRE_TIME = #VOCHR_NTSS_REQRE_TIME# , VOCHR_USE_MTH = #VOCHR_USE_MTH# , GUIDANCE_USE_TIME = #GUIDANCE_USE_TIME# , GUIDANCE_REQRE_TIME = #GUIDANCE_REQRE_TIME# , GUIDANCE_AGE_DIV = #GUIDANCE_AGE_DIV# , GUIDANCE_TOUR_SCHDUL = #GUIDANCE_TOUR_SCHDUL# , GUIDANCE_PRFPLC_LC = #GUIDANCE_PRFPLC_LC# , GUIDANCE_EDC_CRSE = #GUIDANCE_EDC_CRSE# , GUIDANCE_OPTN_MATTER = #GUIDANCE_OPTN_MATTER# , GUIDANCE_PICKUP = #GUIDANCE_PICKUP# , GUIDANCE_PRPARETG = #GUIDANCE_PRPARETG# , GUIDANCE_INCLS_MATTER = #GUIDANCE_INCLS_MATTER# , GUIDANCE_NOT_INCLS_MATTER = #GUIDANCE_NOT_INCLS_MATTER# , ADIT_GUIDANCE = #ADIT_GUIDANCE# , ATENT_MATTER = #ATENT_MATTER# , CHANGE_REFND_REGLTN = #CHANGE_REFND_REGLTN# , INTRCN_GOODS_TY = #INTRCN_GOODS_TY# , INTRCN_USE_TIME = #INTRCN_USE_TIME# , INTRCN_MEET_TIME = #INTRCN_MEET_TIME# , INTRCN_REQRE_TIME = #INTRCN_REQRE_TIME# , INTRCN_PROVD_LANG = #INTRCN_PROVD_LANG# , INTRCN_POSBL_AGE = #INTRCN_POSBL_AGE# , INTRCN_PLACE = #INTRCN_PLACE# , VIDEO_URL = #VIDEO_URL# , VIDEO_MAIN_EXPSR_AT = NVL(#VIDEO_MAIN_EXPSR_AT#, 'N') , VIDEO_SORT_ORDR = #VIDEO_SORT_ORDR# , REPRSNT_PRICE = #REPRSNT_PRICE# , HOTELSCOMBINE_YN = #HOTELSCOMBINE_YN# , HOTELSCOMBINE_SCRIPT = #HOTELSCOMBINE_SCRIPT# , PARTICULAR_YN = #PARTICULAR_YN# , WAITRESERVATION_YN = #WAITRESERVATION_YN# , PICKUP_INCLS_AT = NVL(#PICKUP_INCLS_AT#, 'N') , TOUR_DAYS = #TOUR_DAYS# , HOTDEAL_BEGIN_DE = REPLACE(#HOTDEAL_BEGIN_DE#, '-', '') , HOTDEAL_END_DE = REPLACE(#HOTDEAL_END_DE#, '-', '') , HOTDEAL_APPLC_BEGIN_DE = REPLACE(#HOTDEAL_APPLC_BEGIN_DE#, '-', '') , HOTDEAL_APPLC_END_DE = REPLACE(#HOTDEAL_APPLC_END_DE#, '-', '') , UPDT_ID = #WRITNG_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#

UPDATE TB_GOODS SET UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , GOODS_NM = #GOODS_NM# , GOODS_NM_SUB = #GOODS_NM_SUB# , CL_CODE = #CL_CODE# , CTY_CODE = #CTY_CODE# , GOODS_INTRCN = #GOODS_INTRCN:CLOB# , GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL = #GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL# , WAIT_TIME = LPAD(#WAIT_HOUR#, 2, '0')||LPAD(#WAIT_MINUTE#, 2, '0') , MVMN_TIME = LPAD(#MVMN_HOUR#, 2, '0')||LPAD(#MVMN_MINUTE#, 2, '0') , ACT_LA = #ACT_LA# , ACT_LO = #ACT_LO# , CL_SE = #CL_SE# , SORT_ORDR = #SORT_ORDR# , HOTDEAL_AT = DECODE(#HOTDEAL_MAIN_AT#, 'Y', 'Y', NVL(#HOTDEAL_AT#, 'N')) , RECOMEND_AT = DECODE(#RECOMEND_MAIN_AT#, 'Y', 'Y', NVL(#RECOMEND_AT#, 'N')) , HOTDEAL_MAIN_AT = NVL(#HOTDEAL_MAIN_AT#, 'N') , RECOMEND_MAIN_AT = NVL(#RECOMEND_MAIN_AT#, 'N') , HOTDEAL_SORT_ORDR = #HOTDEAL_SORT_ORDR# , RECOMEND_SORT_ORDR = #RECOMEND_SORT_ORDR# , VOCHR_TICKET_TY = 'V' , VOCHR_NTSS_REQRE_TIME = #VOCHR_NTSS_REQRE_TIME# , VOCHR_USE_MTH = #VOCHR_USE_MTH# , INTRCN_GOODS_TY = DECODE(#INTRCN_GOODS_TY#, '선택', '', #INTRCN_GOODS_TY#) , INTRCN_USE_TIME = #INTRCN_USE_TIME# , INTRCN_MEET_TIME = #INTRCN_MEET_TIME# , INTRCN_REQRE_TIME = #INTRCN_REQRE_TIME# , INTRCN_PROVD_LANG = #INTRCN_PROVD_LANG# , INTRCN_POSBL_AGE = #INTRCN_POSBL_AGE# , INTRCN_PLACE = #INTRCN_PLACE# , VIDEO_URL = #VIDEO_URL# , VIDEO_MAIN_EXPSR_AT = NVL(#VIDEO_MAIN_EXPSR_AT#, 'N') , VIDEO_SORT_ORDR = #VIDEO_SORT_ORDR# , REPRSNT_PRICE = #REPRSNT_PRICE# , HOTELSCOMBINE_YN = #HOTELSCOMBINE_YN# , HOTELSCOMBINE_SCRIPT = #HOTELSCOMBINE_SCRIPT# , PARTICULAR_YN = #PARTICULAR_YN# , WAITRESERVATION_YN = #WAITRESERVATION_YN# , PICKUP_INCLS_AT = NVL(#PICKUP_INCLS_AT#, 'N') , TOUR_DAYS = #TOUR_DAYS# , HOTDEAL_BEGIN_DE = REPLACE(#HOTDEAL_BEGIN_DE#, '-', '') , HOTDEAL_END_DE = REPLACE(#HOTDEAL_END_DE#, '-', '') , HOTDEAL_APPLC_BEGIN_DE = REPLACE(#HOTDEAL_APPLC_BEGIN_DE#, '-', '') , HOTDEAL_APPLC_END_DE = REPLACE(#HOTDEAL_APPLC_END_DE#, '-', '') WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#

UPDATE TB_GOODS_ENG SET UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , GOODS_NM_ENG = #GOODS_NM_ENG# , GOODS_NM_SUB_ENG = #GOODS_NM_SUB_ENG# , GOODS_INTRCN_ENG = #GOODS_INTRCN_ENG:CLOB# , GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL_ENG = #GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL_ENG# , VOCHR_NTSS_REQRE_TIME_ENG = #VOCHR_NTSS_REQRE_TIME_ENG# , VOCHR_USE_MTH_ENG = #VOCHR_USE_MTH_ENG# , INTRCN_USE_TIME_ENG = #INTRCN_USE_TIME_ENG# , INTRCN_MEET_TIME_ENG = #INTRCN_MEET_TIME_ENG# , INTRCN_REQRE_TIME_ENG = #INTRCN_REQRE_TIME_ENG# , INTRCN_PROVD_LANG_ENG = #INTRCN_PROVD_LANG_ENG# , INTRCN_POSBL_AGE_ENG = #INTRCN_POSBL_AGE_ENG# , INTRCN_PLACE_ENG = #INTRCN_PLACE_ENG# WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#

UPDATE TB_GOODS SET UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , GUIDANCE_USE_TIME = #GUIDANCE_USE_TIME# , GUIDANCE_REQRE_TIME = #GUIDANCE_REQRE_TIME# , GUIDANCE_AGE_DIV = #GUIDANCE_AGE_DIV# , GUIDANCE_TOUR_SCHDUL = #GUIDANCE_TOUR_SCHDUL# , GUIDANCE_PRFPLC_LC = #GUIDANCE_PRFPLC_LC# , GUIDANCE_EDC_CRSE = #GUIDANCE_EDC_CRSE# , GUIDANCE_OPTN_MATTER = #GUIDANCE_OPTN_MATTER# , GUIDANCE_PICKUP = #GUIDANCE_PICKUP# , GUIDANCE_PRPARETG = #GUIDANCE_PRPARETG# , GUIDANCE_INCLS_MATTER = #GUIDANCE_INCLS_MATTER# , GUIDANCE_NOT_INCLS_MATTER = #GUIDANCE_NOT_INCLS_MATTER# WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#

UPDATE TB_GOODS_ENG SET UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , GUIDANCE_USE_TIME_ENG = #GUIDANCE_USE_TIME_ENG# , GUIDANCE_REQRE_TIME_ENG = #GUIDANCE_REQRE_TIME_ENG# , GUIDANCE_AGE_DIV_ENG = #GUIDANCE_AGE_DIV_ENG# , GUIDANCE_TOUR_SCHDUL_ENG = #GUIDANCE_TOUR_SCHDUL_ENG# , GUIDANCE_PRFPLC_LC_ENG = #GUIDANCE_PRFPLC_LC_ENG# , GUIDANCE_EDC_CRSE_ENG = #GUIDANCE_EDC_CRSE_ENG# , GUIDANCE_OPTN_MATTER_ENG = #GUIDANCE_OPTN_MATTER_ENG# , GUIDANCE_PICKUP_ENG = #GUIDANCE_PICKUP_ENG# , GUIDANCE_PRPARETG_ENG = #GUIDANCE_PRPARETG_ENG# , GUIDANCE_INCLS_MATTER_ENG = #GUIDANCE_INCLS_MATTER_ENG# , GUIDANCE_NOT_INCLS_MATTER_ENG = #GUIDANCE_NOT_INCLS_MATTER_ENG# WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#

UPDATE TB_GOODS SET UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , ADIT_GUIDANCE = #ADIT_GUIDANCE# , ATENT_MATTER = #ATENT_MATTER# , CHANGE_REFND_REGLTN = #CHANGE_REFND_REGLTN# WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#

UPDATE TB_GOODS_ENG SET UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , ADIT_GUIDANCE_ENG = #ADIT_GUIDANCE_ENG# , ATENT_MATTER_ENG = #ATENT_MATTER_ENG# , CHANGE_REFND_REGLTN_ENG = #CHANGE_REFND_REGLTN_ENG# WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_GOODS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , DELETE_ID = #UPDT_ID# , DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE DELETE_AT <> 'Y' AND GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#
UPDATE TB_GOODS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , DELETE_ID = #UPDT_ID# , DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE DELETE_AT <> 'Y' AND GOODS_CODE IN #GOODS_CODE_LIST[]#
UPDATE TB_GOODS SET DELETE_AT = 'T' , WAIT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , WAIT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE DELETE_AT = 'Y' AND GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_GOODS SET DELETE_AT = 'N' , SLE_BEGIN_ID = #UPDT_ID# , SLE_BEGIN_DT = SYSDATE , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE DELETE_AT = 'T' AND GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#
sqlMap.sql: SELECT A.GOODS_CODE , A.GOODS_NM , A.GOODS_NM_SUB , A.GOODS_INTRCN , A.GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL , A.DELETE_AT , DECODE(A.DELETE_AT, 'N', 'Y', 'N') USE_AT , A.FILE_CODE , A.WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WRITNG_DT , A.UPDT_ID , TO_CHAR(A.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPDT_DT , A.SLE_BEGIN_ID , TO_CHAR(A.SLE_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SLE_BEGIN_DT , A.WAIT_TIME , A.MVMN_TIME , A.ACT_LA , A.ACT_LO , (SELECT UPPER_CL_CODE FROM TB_TOUR_CL X WHERE X.CL_CODE = A.CL_CODE) UPPER_CL_CODE , A.CL_CODE , (SELECT C.CL_NM FROM TB_TOUR_CL C WHERE A.CL_CODE = C.CL_CODE) CL_NM , (SELECT NATION_CODE FROM TB_CTY X WHERE X.CTY_CODE = A.CTY_CODE) NATION_CODE , A.CTY_CODE , (SELECT C.CTY_NM FROM TB_CTY C WHERE A.CTY_CODE = C.CTY_CODE) CTY_NM , A.CL_SE , A.SORT_ORDR , A.HOTDEAL_AT , A.RECOMEND_AT , A.HOTDEAL_MAIN_AT , A.RECOMEND_MAIN_AT , A.HOTDEAL_SORT_ORDR , A.RECOMEND_SORT_ORDR , A.VOCHR_TICKET_TY , A.VOCHR_NTSS_REQRE_TIME , A.VOCHR_USE_MTH , A.GUIDANCE_USE_TIME , A.GUIDANCE_REQRE_TIME , A.GUIDANCE_AGE_DIV , A.GUIDANCE_TOUR_SCHDUL , A.GUIDANCE_PRFPLC_LC , A.GUIDANCE_EDC_CRSE , A.GUIDANCE_OPTN_MATTER , A.GUIDANCE_PICKUP , A.GUIDANCE_PRPARETG , A.GUIDANCE_INCLS_MATTER , A.GUIDANCE_NOT_INCLS_MATTER , A.ADIT_GUIDANCE , A.ATENT_MATTER , A.CHANGE_REFND_REGLTN , A.INTRCN_GOODS_TY , A.INTRCN_USE_TIME , A.INTRCN_MEET_TIME , A.INTRCN_REQRE_TIME , A.INTRCN_PROVD_LANG , A.INTRCN_POSBL_AGE , A.INTRCN_PLACE , 'U' CRUD_SE , B.GOODS_NM_ENG , B.GOODS_NM_SUB_ENG , B.GOODS_INTRCN_ENG , B.GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL_ENG , B.VOCHR_NTSS_REQRE_TIME_ENG , B.VOCHR_USE_MTH_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_USE_TIME_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_REQRE_TIME_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_AGE_DIV_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_TOUR_SCHDUL_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_PRFPLC_LC_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_EDC_CRSE_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_OPTN_MATTER_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_PICKUP_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_PRPARETG_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_INCLS_MATTER_ENG , B.GUIDANCE_NOT_INCLS_MATTER_ENG , B.ADIT_GUIDANCE_ENG , B.ATENT_MATTER_ENG , B.CHANGE_REFND_REGLTN_ENG , B.INTRCN_USE_TIME_ENG , B.INTRCN_MEET_TIME_ENG , B.INTRCN_REQRE_TIME_ENG , B.INTRCN_PROVD_LANG_ENG , B.INTRCN_POSBL_AGE_ENG , B.INTRCN_PLACE_ENG , A.VIDEO_URL , A.VIDEO_MAIN_EXPSR_AT , (SELECT SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X,',', KWRD) ORDER BY KWRD_SN).EXTRACT('//text()'),2) FROM TB_GOODS_KWRD X WHERE X.GOODS_CODE = A.GOODS_CODE) KEYWORDS , A.PICKUP_INCLS_AT , A.TOUR_DAYS , A.HOTDEAL_BEGIN_DE , A.HOTDEAL_END_DE , A.HOTDEAL_APPLC_BEGIN_DE , A.HOTDEAL_APPLC_END_DE , A.VIDEO_SORT_ORDR , A.REPRSNT_PRICE , A.HOTELSCOMBINE_YN , A.HOTELSCOMBINE_SCRIPT , A.PARTICULAR_YN , (SELECT SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X,',', USER_ID) ORDER BY SORT_ORDR).EXTRACT('//text()'),2) FROM TB_GOODS_USER X WHERE X.GOODS_CODE = A.GOODS_CODE) AS PARTICULAR_USERID , A.WAITRESERVATION_YN FROM TB_GOODS A , TB_GOODS_ENG B WHERE A.GOODS_CODE = B.GOODS_CODE(+)
sqlMap.select:
AND A.DELETE_AT = #DELETE_AT#
ORDER BY A.WRITNG_DT, A.GOODS_CODE

isEmpty.isNotEmpty: AND A.CL_CODE IN (SELECT CL_CODE FROM TB_TOUR_CL WHERE UPPER_CL_CODE = #UPPER_CL_CODE#)

sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(A.GOODS_CODE) FROM TB_GOODS A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY M.SORT_ORDR*1000 + N.SORT_ORDR, A.DELETE_AT, A.SORT_ORDR) AS ROWSEQ , A.GOODS_CODE , A.GOODS_NM , A.GOODS_NM_SUB , A.CL_CODE , N.CL_NM , M.CL_NM AS UPPER_CL_NM , M.SORT_ORDR*1000 + N.SORT_ORDR AS CF_SORT_ORDR , A.CTY_CODE , (SELECT X.CTY_NM FROM TB_CTY X WHERE X.CTY_CODE = A.CTY_CODE AND X.NATION_CODE <> '00000') CTY_NM , A.CL_SE , A.SORT_ORDR , A.FILE_CODE , A.HOTDEAL_AT , A.RECOMEND_AT , A.HOTDEAL_SORT_ORDR , A.RECOMEND_SORT_ORDR , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HOTDEAL_BEGIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') HOTDEAL_BEGIN_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HOTDEAL_END_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') HOTDEAL_END_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HOTDEAL_APPLC_BEGIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') HOTDEAL_APPLC_BEGIN_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HOTDEAL_APPLC_END_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') HOTDEAL_APPLC_END_DE , A.DELETE_AT , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE X WHERE X.CODE_ID='COM007' AND X.CODE = A.DELETE_AT) DELETE_AT_NM , TO_CHAR(A.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WRITNG_DT , TO_CHAR(A.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPDT_DT , TO_CHAR(A.SLE_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SLE_BEGIN_DT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_FILE_DETAIL X WHERE A.FILE_CODE = X.FILE_CODE) CF_FILE_CNT FROM TB_GOODS A INNER JOIN TB_TOUR_CL N ON N.CL_CODE = A.CL_CODE INNER JOIN TB_TOUR_CL M ON M.CL_CODE = N.UPPER_CL_CODE WHERE 1 = 1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GOODS_USER (GOODS_CODE, USER_ID, SORT_ORDR) SELECT #GOODS_CODE#, #USER_ID#, NVL(MAX(SORT_ORDR), 0) + 1 FROM TB_GOODS_USER WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#
